question: Who has been appointed India's High Commissioner to Canada?
explanation: Vikas Swarup, an officer of the Indian Foreign Service batch of 1986,  has been appointed as new High Commissioner of India to Canada. He is famous for penning down the novel Q & A, adapted in film as Slumdog Millionaire.  Currently, Swarup is working as Spokesperson in the Ministry of External Affairs in New Delhi. He will replace Arun Kumar Sahu who is currently working as acting Indian envoy in Canada.
